item.title: Sample CTF Challenge: Web Exploitation
item.description: This is a sample CTF writeup to demonstrate how I’ll structure my cybersecurity challenge solutions. Challenge Overview Challenge Name: Sample Web App Category: Web Exploitation Difficulty: Easy Points: 100 Initial Reconnaissance The challenge presents us with a simple web application. Let’s start by understanding what we’re working with: 1 2 # Basic port scan nmap -sC -sV target.com Vulnerability Discovery After exploring the application, I identified a potential SQL injection vulnerability in the login form.
